issues.description: Constructor signature mismatch: the problem statement and UML specify a constructor SealSaloon(String) for the saloon name, but both the templateâ€™s Main class and the solution implement only a no-argument constructor (SealSaloon()). This will confuse students about which constructor to create and lead to failing tests expecting SealSaloon(String).
issues.suggested_fix: Add a public constructor accepting a String parameter in SealSaloon (public SealSaloon(String name)), and update Main (and tests) to call this constructor accordingly.
